title: Welcome
description: Ilyas Hamid provides world-class acupuncture in Hollywood FL. Call and start improving your health today: (954) 258-7643
cleaned_text: Welcome "Judge your Success by the Degree of your Health and Happiness" Internal health consists of having homeostasis with Physical, Mental Emotional and Spiritual health. When Harmony and Balance is found within the metabolism, Harmony and Balance can easily be found in the "real world" environment. With integrity and diligence, I treat the source of illness with the most modern Integrative therapies from Eastern and Western Medicine. Healing the Mind, Body, and Soul creates an environment of Health and Happiness. Balance Integrative Medicine treats illnesses such as: - Autoimmune Disease - Pain Management - Stress/Anxiety - Depression - Arthritis - Gastrointestinal Disease - Adrenal Stress and Fatigue - Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder - Cold & Flu - Insomnia - and more... To get in touch with me, through email click on "Contact Me" on the left side panel. For contact through phone, please call 954-258-7643 Thank you for visiting! For Insurance Verification, Follow this link: [https://www.enterverification.com/pb/pbtmb.php?pk=BvaLJMGM](https://www.enterverification.com/pb/pbtmb.php?pk=BvaLJMGM)
